QuestData.Title: The Foot of the Fortress
QuestData.Description: We've enkindled your forces and the scroll is ready.$B$BIt's time for phase two - stealing a nexus crystal from a heavily fortified ogre compound.$B$BWe'll save the scroll to bring in reinforcements in our confrontation with the Gordunni Witch Lord. Let's meet at the base of the Gordal Foothills and take what is more or less rightfully yours!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Magister Krelas at the entrance to Gordal Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: My apologies for teleporting away. It's cheating, I know.$B$BI merely wanted to put a fire under your feet to get here quickly!
